title: Calories in 10 Almonds
meta_description: Discover calories in 10 almonds, including protein, fat, carbs, full nutrition breakdown per almond, and simple tweaks for variations.
assumptions: Raw, unsalted, whole almonds; approximately 1.2 g each.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by variety, processing, brand, and portion size. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: 10 raw almonds provide ~70 kcal and ~2.5 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

faqs.q: How many calories in one almond?
What is the fat content in 10 almonds?
faqs.a: Approximately 6 g total fat, mostly healthy unsaturated fats.

faqs.q: Do almonds have carbs or fiber?
faqs.a: 10 almonds have ~2.6 g carbs and 1.5 g fiber.

faqs.q: Are roasted almonds higher in calories than raw?
faqs.a: Yes, if oil-roasted; dry-roasted are similar to raw at ~7 kcal each.
Roughly 2.5 g protein, making them a good snack for satiety.
